projects.title: AutoML with Generative Agentic AI
projects.description: Complete data pipeline from preprocessing to model prediction using LangChain, LangGraph, and Hugging Face Transformers. Features intelligent automation of the entire ML workflow with agentic AI orchestration.
projects.shortDescription: Intelligent automation of the entire ML workflow using agentic AI frameworks.
projects.impact: Automated data science lifecycle with intelligent agentic AI orchestration
achievements: Developed complete data pipeline from preprocessing to model prediction
Integrated LangChain and LangGraph for agentic AI orchestration
Built React frontend for dataset uploads and interactive predictions
Designed Django REST APIs for pipeline management and report generation
Integrated MySQL & MongoDB; deployed on Azure for scalability

projects.title: Data Pre-Processing Interface

projects.shortDescription: Intelligent data preprocessing platform with AI-powered guidance.
projects.impact: Streamlined data preprocessing workflows with intelligent automation
achievements: Built user-friendly platform for data cleaning and transformation
Integrated ChatGPT API for intelligent preprocessing guidance

Addressed raw data challenges and optimized datasets for ML workflows

projects.title: Intelligent Chatbot with NLP
